synopsis.text: February 11, 2021 marked the debut of "Seduced by My Best Friend," an anime adapted from Yupopo Orishima's manga. The series follows the unstoppable duo, Shion and Rui, who are known for their successful escapades with women. One night, Shion's plans for another conquest take an unexpected turn when he unwittingly consumes a mysterious drug. Upon waking up, Shion finds himself transformed into a woman! As Rui sets out to find his missing friend, he fails to recognize the new, female Shion and instead, makes advances towards her. The anime aired on Tokyo MX and was also streamed uncensored on the ComicFesta Anime Zone website. Prepare for a wild ride as Shion navigates this unexpected twist in a tale filled with humor, confusion, and a hint of romance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
